reviews.review:
Fun game!
Shooting feels nice (Hand Cannon!) and vigor adds a lot of fun.
Also rifts are a nice addition.
Setting is pretty amazing, the plot is ok as well, eventhough it is very predictable.
Nice grafics and some amazing scenes.
You should buy the collection during a sale for sure!

OK basicly im a fan cause you can just use the hand cannon (upgraded) and nearly 1-2 shoot (hs) every enemy (some need 2-3 hits to remove the helmet) but handyman and some other special mobs -which are rather rare though) on hard (hardest difficulty available from the start).
10 Запутанных сюжетов из 10.

Вбиваєш людішок всіма можливими способами, чим хочеш, як хочеш, коли хочеш, коли не хочеш, коли можеш, коли не можеш, коли в тебе справи в реальному житті. З потойбічними силами гратися круто але після того, як ви отримаєте шокову, ви нахрін забудете про інші, бо це така імба... Графон краще ніж в террарії і це вже радує. Музон Який хочеш, який не хочеш. Є нормальні треки з "нашого" світу але вони зустрічаються рідко. Ця баришня, яка постійно з вами бігає дуже корисна, бо буде кидати вам в єблет все, що попадеться їй під руку: патрони, енергєтіки, гроші. Вот би в Ріал лайфі так. Для таких валєтів як я, які знають тільки, шо London is the capital of Great Britain є субтитри, ЯКІ НЕМАЄ ЧАСУ ЧИТАТИ, БО ТЕБЕ РОЗНОСЯТЬ З ВСІХ СТОРІН, А ЗБОКУ ВОНА ГОВОРИТЬ ЯКУСЬ ВАЖЛИВУ ІНФУ, А ПОТІМ ТИ ДУМАЄШ: "за яким хером я прийшов в цю локацію???". Cyка, рекомендую, якшо в ває є мишка, монітор, клава, сис(сас).блок, руки, ноги, мозок, очі...
이건 한마디로 갓겜이다

Buena jugabilidad, interesante historia; tienes con que entretenerte por un buen rato; sobretodo con los retos Blue Ribbon

One of my favourite games! I have played it (and it's DLC's) when it came out on normal difficulty and replayed it in 2018 on 1999 difficulty almost 100% completing it and it's DLC. (IE collecting everything)

[h1]Positives:[/h1]
- The art style/graphics holds up really well
- The world/setting is fantastic
- Characters are interesting and engaging
- Story is really well played out and well written (although some plot holes can be found if you go really deep into it)
- Music choices are fantastic and also has a great original OST aswell.
- The burial at sea story DLC's are also great. They change combat aswell. Combat in the clouds DLC has some nice unlockables, but only get it if you really like the combat of the base Bioshock Infinite game.

[h1]Negatives:[/h1]
- Combat can feel a bit limiting to what it could have been if they had gotten rid of things like two weapon limit at any time.
- Does drag on a little in a small middle part of the game in my opinion.
- 1999 mode isn't difficulty done right. Turns the combat into a cover based one unless you get really creative with vigors.
- Very linear for most of the game. Could be seen as both a negative and a positive depending on your outlook and taste.
Kozak giera!

Uma da melhores experiências que já tive em termos de jogos. Fantástica contrução de mundo, trilha sonora, personagens carismáticos que interagem muito bem e uma storytelling cativante. Achei que este foi o mais fácil dos três Bioshock, talvez por causa da jogabilidade aprimorada deste terceiro jogo, mas independentemente, eu estava preso a essa história que com certeza vai te surpreender.
I don't understand why some people hate this game. It is a good game.

A pesar de que recibió criticas agresivas que hacían ilusión a su sistema de combate, entre otras cosas... A mi me parece, quizás, mejor o igual que el primero.
Por lo menos consigue que pueda empatizar con el protagonista y, por supuesto, con uno de las mejores co-protagonistas de un videojuego.
광광우럭따 .... 갓겜중에 갓겜...  10/10
This game has one of the best narratives i have ever seen in fiction preiod. If you're into games with good storytelling, please get this.

Bioshock: Hooked on a feeling.

Bioshock Infinite has one of the best narratives I have ever witnessed in a game. I was totally hooked for the entirr game and when the main story finished, I sat in my chair and was completely mind blown. Bioshock left me speechless and I felt like I was on the verge of insanity. The more I think about the story, the more I remember about some of the errors in the story, but it doesn't matter to me, because the story leaves you a sense of accomplishment and happyness for a long time.

Gameplay in Biosjock Infinite isn't bad and the guns feel interesting and effective. Kills are satisfying and the animations are beatiful. I find the artistic style of Bioshock Infinte beatiful and it fits the game perfectly.

9/10

My first and memorable game, it takes my emotion and a lil break to think 'whats happen' about the story, give me sadness about months cuz the ending of infinite is out of my expectation :( the story is masterpiece!!! Definitely will play it again <3

Sin lugar a duda una obra maestra, es excelente en todos los ambitos, sonido, historia, jugabilidad, etc., además mencionar lo bien optimizado que esta el juego es maravilloso, mi recomendación es que compres la saga juntos con los DLC's, son altamente necesarios y juega los otros Bioshock antes de llegar a este para que puedas disfrutar de toda la hermosa historia, otro consejo que dare es: presta mucha atención al ambiente, te enteraras de muchos datos importantes que te ayudaran a entender la historia. Sin mas preambulos, adquiere esta hermosisima saga, 100% recomendada.

No other game has struck me this hard in years. As the game progressed, I felt myself getting closer with the characters and caring for their well-being. Props to the creators for this masterpiece. Would recommend it to anyone who loves a good story. 10/10

This game was one of the best games I had ever played..... right up until the end. Maybe I am not smart enough, but I lost the plot somehw and could not figure out exactly what was going on. Its as if the writers got so carried away that they couldnt really tie up loose ends. I might have to try and play this game again after reading some psychology books

Eigentlich ein sehr gutes [Haupt-]Spiel, aber für den Preis hätte ich mehr Umfang erwartet. Ich meine, ich gebe immer gerne Geld für Spiele aus, die es wert sind, meine Rechnung dazu ist eine Stunde Spielzeit pro € den ich bezahle, aber selbst mit meinem eher langsamen Spielstiel bin ich nur auf knapp 6 Stunden gekommen, damit hat es sich nichtmal jetzt im Sale wirklich rentiert. Ich bin daher auch eher vorsichtig, was die DLC´s angeht, wenn die so schon so wenig kosten stell ich mir da je eine Einzelmission drunter vor... Da bleib ich lieber bei Borderlands ^^

Единственная игра, в которой напарник реально помогает в бою и не мешается под ногами. Невероятно красочная и красивая игра, с потрясающей музыкой, приятной стрельбой и отличным звуком

Bir gün oyunlarım arasında gezerken 'Hangisini bitirmedim,Hangi oyunu oynasam?' diye geziyordum kütüphanemde 'Bioshock Infinite' adlı oyunumu gördüm.Aldığımda beğenmiştim resimlerinden.Oyuna girince bam başka bir atmosfer karşınızda.Borderlands ama daha karanlık.Dishonored ama daha aydınlık.Tam ortayı bulmuş muazzam bir oyun.Açıkcası oyunun sonuna kadar hikaye hakkında hiçbirşey anlamıyorsunuz.Ama oyunun sonuna kadar o gördüğünüz şeylerin hepsi birbirini tutunca 'oha lan beynim yandı' 'dur laan şimdi anladım' gibi bir şaşırma durumlarına giriyorsunuz.Hadi gene anlamadınız.Oyunu bitirin ve forumlara bakın.Oyun çok zevkli.Olsun büyüler.Olsun silahlar.Mükemmel Bir Atmosfer Aşırı zevkli bir gameplay'i de var.

OYUNUN EN KOMİK ALTINIZA SIÇTIRTAN ANI:

-Elizabeth adlı kızı kurtarmaya gidiyorsunuz kafes kapısını konsoldan açıyorsunuz.Tam arkanızı döndüğünüz anda amına kodumun nerdeyse kalp krizi geçirtmemi sağlayın 'Boy Of Silence' adlı hostile npc çıkıyor.Aniden çıktı ve yerimden sıçradım hele o çığlık atıp adamları alarma sokması... 5 saniyelik bir kalp kriziydi.

Neyse oyunu sizde deneyin oynamadıysanız oynayın.Çok zevkli eğer bir sorunuz olursa bu yorumun altına sorabilirsiniz cevaplarım okuduğunuz için teşekkür ederim.Hayatınızda kesinlikle denemeniz gereken bir oyun.

Alex Rogers bunu tavsiye ediyor.

Gra raczej mnie znudziła. Początek zapowiadał się obiecująco, niestety kiedy zakończyły się elementy fabularne i zaczęła zwykła strzelanka to gra wygląda tak, że należy dobiec w konkretne miejsce strzelając do wszystkiego co się rusza. Dodatkowe umiejętności niby są ale nie są specjalnie potrzebne po za kilkoma nielicznymi sytuacjami, które zostały wprowadzone po to by uzasadnić istnienie tych super mocy (np, naładuj maszynę koło drzwi piorunem, żeby otworzyły  się drzwi) Nudne i odtwórcze. Oczywiście taki typ gier może się podobać, nawet dzisiaj grafika jest na bardzo przyzwoitym poziomie, chociaż zdarzają się bugi jak blokowanie sie postaci, kiedy stara się wbiec na schody, albo przechodzi się zbyt blisko barierki.

Generalnie to nie uda mi się dojść do końca tej gry bo już jestem nią potwornie znudzony.

Uno de los mejores titulos que jugueé en los ultimos años.
Una puta obra maestra 10/10.

De esos juegos que te vuelan la cabeza con su historia. A mi parecer, algo totalmente distinto con los Bioshock anteriores en cuanto a historia y manejo/jugabilidad.
Lo único malo que podría decir es que se necesita comprar los dlc de "Burial at Sea" para poder cerrar la historia final del juego porque sino queda uno que otro cabo suelto o tu cabeza queda volando. Vale la pena comprarlos? sin duda alguna.

Игра говно. Из плюсов приятный графон и саундтрек, хоть его и не много. Управление, стрельба и прицеливание совершенно неудобные. То что чувствительность при прицеливании сильно уменьшается очень мешает и не позволяет перестреливаться с несколькими врагами при этом прицеливаясь. Сюжет местами хромает, а его подача очень убогая. На протяжении всей игры такое ощущение, что количество диалогов уменьшили в два раза, и из-за этого в сюжете мало что понятно. Большинство плазмидов бесполезные, игру можно спокойно пройти используя 2-3. Враги и геймплей в какой-то момент становится однообразным. 5/10.

Finally got around to playing this game after it's been out for years, it is definately worth the price.
-The shooting is still pretty good, but feels a bit dated due to it being a few years old now.
-The story is absolutely amazing
-The game still looks great in 2018, the art style makes it hold up really well even by newer games standards
-If you're a fan of original Bioshock it is different, but has many similarities.
-The DLC is some of the best you can play definately do not skip it off, it connects the story of Infinite to that of the original Bioshock and it does it masterfully
-Side point, the second DLC is all stealth based and the mechanics of this game actually work extremely well for stealth
9/10

Il gioco più bello a cui abbia mai giocato assolutamente, comparto artistico senza eguali, shooting che mantiene la qualità dei vecchi capitoli e un intreccio che cattura il giocatore dall'inizio alla fine della storia, semplicemente il mio gioco preferito
Un gioco che tutti dovrebbero giocare

Beautiful game with a great story. Streamlined compared to the previous Bioshock games, which may be a good thing for some gamers, but not so much for others.

I bought this for the music, and because it seemed weird. It is pretty weird, and I love how weird it is. The game allows you a lot of leeway in how you choose to fight, and it's a bit of a puzzle what works for which enemy. The way the environments are used several times is great and works so well within the story. The story is the best thing about this game. The enemies are kinda dumb but there are a lot of them and the areas you're fighting in are often big so they do move a lot and come at you at a good pace if you're not paying attention. The final battle is a bit of an anticlimax, I had to do it a couple of times because I lost, but when I did win it was kinda sudden how everything was silent. That said, the story ending was really great.

The only thing I really did not like is how sometimes some exposition was done while you were fighting, I tended to concentrate on beating the enemies rather than listening so I missed a bunch. That said, there's a LOT of talk in this game, not all of it important. The voices, sounds and music is all really well done, but sometimes the rhetoric was a bit tiring. However, you can pick and choose what to play for a lot of the background story, so that's nice. The visuals are stunning and the world is really well built. However some of it, especially the highline, gave me motion sickness. I really enjoyed the game though!

Nunca he sido muy fan de los Bioshock pero vi un pack con los 3 bastante barato así que lo pillé. El juego al inicio apenas entiendes nada y se te hace increiblemente lento, pero a medida que vas avanzando se esclarece la historia y se convierte en uno de los juegos más inmersivos que he jugado. Del final ni voy a hablar porque es simplemente increíble.

别的都可以忘，可是有一个画面在我刚通关之后始终难以忘却，那就是找到伊丽莎白之后和她一起战斗的那些章，那个始终跑在我身边的精灵。没有任何一款游戏在女配角上可以超越伊丽莎白。她真的很生动，很真实，让我真的认为她是个有血有肉的角色，她就在那里，一直跟着你，看着你！

This was my first time playing a Bioshock title and I'm mostly impressed. The main story was....uh...interesting in a good way. The cutscenes and dialogue are all intriguing and kept me entertained. I didn't experience any bugs or glitches during my playthrough. Most of the combat and movement mechanics can be learned with ease. There is one part in the beginning that involves grappling which took me a bit to understand but that was moreso a misunderstanding on my part. Overall play time 12 hours, worth the buy.

bioshock infiinite es definitivamente un buen juego entretenido, me mantuvo pegado al monitor pensando en lo que va suceder despues, sus puntos buenos es su entretenida historia al estilo de bioshock, sus personajes ahh y por cierto elizabeth es un amor, me puso sad el cambio de humor que tuvo al final, casi el complejo de un dios tenia.
sus puntos malos es su combate, esos enemigos por oleadas me parecieron muy repetitivos en algunos momentos, ademas quitaron algo que me mantenia entretenido en los anteriores bioshock, los hakeos, de ahi en adelante no hay nada malo, aunque si me hubiera gustado que hubieran mas boss, pero con ese final que te dejo impactado fue mas que sorprendente.

Пожалуй эта игра с самым крутым сюжетом. Саму игру я прошёл за 10ч, а длц которые шли к этой игре я прошёл за 5ч. Пройдя игру в 1ый раз вы можете понять ничего! На полное понятие сюжета мне пришлось потратить чуть меньше недели. Графика тут для хороша как и геймплей. В целом я могу сказать что серия игр BioShock-самая лучшая серия одиночных игр.

Extremely intriguing storyline, beautiful level design and great game overall. Had lots of fun with the skyline fights tho the shooting gets a bit repetitive at times. The voice acting and dialogue is also amazing.

It's one of those games where you wish you could erase your memories and experience it again.

9.5/10

[b] Bioshock Infinite [/b] is a very different entry in the series but still keeps up in what makes Bioshock so great

[b] Amazing Story [/b] With many Jawdropping and very cinematic cutseens and moments
[b] Gameplay still just as good [/b] Not too much different but some fun changes in weapons and vigors
[b] The Setting and Atmosphere is out of this world [/b] A very unique world that's fun to explore and dig deeper into
[b] The DLC's [/b] Burial At Sea Episodes 1&2 are worth playing, mostly Ep2. CitC is alright and can squeeze out a couple hours. I personally mostly liked it

[b] Overall [/b] This game is a must play for Bioshock fans and even anyone who just wants to play a fun, interesting FPS game. The Main Story took me about 15 hours and all the DLC took me about another 15 hours. It can be refreshing to play a game that has care put into it, the Story is Strong and Mindblowing. Only thing worth nitpicking is maybe the difficulty at times, sometimes can be too easy or very hard depending on your difficulty. But nothing is worth nitpicking, the games too good! (9.5/10)
